publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-108 # Mr Adam Ingram: Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to hold a public enquiry into the proposed undersea section of the electricity interconnector between Scotland and Northern Ireland. Supported by: Alasdair Morgan

S1M-108 # Mr Adam Ingram: Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to hold a public enquiry into the proposed undersea section of the electricity interconnector between Scotland and Northern Ireland. Supported by: Alasdair Morgan
S1M-108# Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector (lodged on 31 August 1999) Michael Russell*

S1M-108# Mr Adam Ingram: Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to hold a public enquiry into the proposed undersea section of the electricity interconnector between Scotland and Northern Ireland. Supported by: Michael Russell, Alasdair Morgan
S1M-108# Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector (lodged on 31 August 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-108# Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector (lodged on 31 August 1999) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-108# Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector (lodged on 31 August 1999) Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-108# Mr Adam Ingram: Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to hold a public enquiry into the proposed undersea section of the electricity interconnector between Scotland and Northern Ireland. Supported by: Michael Russell, Alasdair Morgan, Dr Winnie Ewing, Andrew Wilson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Duncan Hamilton

S1M-108# Mr Adam Ingram: Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to hold a public enquiry into the proposed undersea section of the electricity interconnector between Scotland and Northern Ireland. Supported by: Michael Russell, Alasdair Morgan, Dr Winnie Ewing, Andrew Wilson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Duncan Hamilton

S1M-108# Mr Adam Ingram: Public Inquiry into undersea section of Scotland to Northern Ireland electricity interconnector-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to hold a public enquiry into the proposed undersea section of the electricity interconnector between Scotland and Northern Ireland. Supported by: Michael Russell, Alasdair Morgan, Dr Winnie Ewing, Andrew Wilson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Duncan Hamilton
